EmailTemplate.name: Tour Confirmation Email Alternate Location
EmailTemplate.subject: We canâ€™t wait to meet you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c},
Thanks for your interest in WeWork, the platform for creators.
We're thrilled that you're thinking about becoming a member and look forward to showing you around.
You're all set for a tour on {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}! While we're currently reserving desks for {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c}, this space is still being completed. In the meantime, please meet us at WeWork River North at 111 W Illinois Street.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to westloop@wework.com.
See you soon!
The WeWork Team
joinus@wework.com 855.593.9675
